summary: Update the server version-feature mapping to include Node.js SDK support for execution chain following. Also verify that SDK version info is being properly sent to the server.
userImpact: Without the version mapping update, the execution chain following fix won't be utilized until the server recognizes the Node.js SDK version.
rootCause: The execution chain following fix requires an updated version-feature mapping on the server side to recognize and use the capability from the Node.js SDK.
proposedFix: Update the server version mapping to include Node.js SDK support, and consider sending client capabilities from the client instead of relying on version mapping.
resolutionDetails: Issue closed; mapping was updated as a post-release task. Related sdk-features issue #142 opened to track SDKs sending client capabilities.
keyQuote: The fix we made to follow execution chains under the new model won't be used until we add node to the version mapping
